strings.Value: "I recall a lecture at the College of Mysteriesâ€¦ The professor was well-versed in the brain, and various of its... deviations. He demonstrated a patient who'd begun to hear voices, after being hit by an arrow in the temporal region."
"Why do you and the others try so hard to convince me I'm crazy? Is it because you secretly know that I'm right, and you're afraid to admit it, even to yourself?"
